chunk:
Thayers Witch Hazel Face Mist, Unscented

Brand: Thayers

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Bark/Leaf/Twig Extract*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract*, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Potassium Hydroxide
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
